bibl.title: Letter from Melvin D. Brewer to Philip Showalter Hench, October 7, 1940

div1.p: Brewer requests a photograph of Hench to help publicize the presentation of Hench's honorary degree.

div1.head: Letter from Melvin D. Brewer to Philip Showalter Hench, October 7, 1940

opener.dateline:
THE ALUMNI ASSOCIATION
OFFICE OF THE SECRETARY
WASHINGTON AND JEFFERSON COLLEGE
WASHINGTON, PENNSYLVANIA
October 7, 1940

div1.p:
I am delighted to hear from our Board of
Trustees that you will be honored at our Founders'
Day exercises on October 26 with an honorary degree
from the College.

In order to make our publicity coverage on
this event as complete as possible, I would appreciate
your sending me your latest photograph at your earli-
est convenience. We would prefer a glossy photo for
newspaper reproduction.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, Melvin D. Brewer
Alumni Secretary Dr. Philip S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
